title: How many different songs does the average guitarist know how to play? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let’s see. If your average guitarist knows music theory (scales, circle of 5th etc) then they will know pretty much all the songs. All you need is the key to play in. “…You played robbery with insolenceAnd I played the blues in twelve bars down Lover's LaneAnd you never did have the intelligence to useThe twelve keys hanging off from my chain…”
